knimeNode.name: SPARQL Query
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs a SPARQL search on an endpoint and retrieves the result as a table

fullDescription.intro: A SPARQL query is sent to the SPARQL endpoint and the resulting table is sent to the out-port. All result are retrieved as string cells. The node uses the java libraries provided by the Apache Jena project (https://jena.apache.org/, version 2.12.1)
fullDescription.option: The SPARQL query string, an example query is provided in the default setting
Address of a SPARQL Endpoint, an example for the ChEMBL endpoint is provided in the default setting

ports.outPort: Table with string columns corresponding to each queried variable
